Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Jenurax
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: The refined form of Opila, this crystal has been cleansed of all impurities. When used in lightsaber construction it produces a blade of unerring quickness.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Luxum
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: Ambria was a world in the grip of the dark side. Through years of mental battle, strange Jedi Master Thon contained the evil to Lake Natth. Long meditation can form this powerful crystal from the tainted water.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Bondar
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: This crystal was mined on a far-orbit asteroid circling the Alderaan system. It produces a volatile lightsaber beam that pulses on impact, discharging part of its energy into an opponent.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Dragite
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: Dragite crystals are found on M'haeli, in the D'olop mountain range. The beam they create resonates loudly when it strikes, inflicting a minor amount of sonic damage.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Krayt Dragon Pearl
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: Taken from the gullet of a krayt dragon, this crystalline "pearl" appears to have refractory qualities that might allow it to function as a lightsaber crystal once properly adapted.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Firkann
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: This heavy crystal is collected by the natives of Rafa V. If used in lightsaber construction it produces an electrically charged beam that is much easier to manipulate than standard beams.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Pontite
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: Pontite is one of the rarest forms of Adegan crystal. It radiates a powerful aura that cools both skin and tempers.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Stygium
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: The stygium mineral can be used to create cloaking effects that foil enemy sensors. In its pure crystal form, it is suitable for a lightsaber.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Ultima Pearl
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: An unusual choice for a lightsaber focusing crystal, this rare stone can be found on Calamari. Difficult to properly install in a lightsaber, this valuable stone has powerful effects.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Barab Ore Ingot
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: The ore from Barab I actually lies on the planet's surface, meaning it is exposed to high doses of radiation and torrential downpours daily. This ore can be found in concentrated ingots that actual store and magnify the radiation. When placed in a lightsaber, the ingots produce a blade that burns almost to the point of losing its cohesion.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Hurrikaine
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: The very rare Hurrikaine crystal is best known for its unparalleled beauty. When used in a lightsaber, the dark gemstone creates a devastating beam that can partially penetrate any defenses.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Artusian
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: Found only on an obscure colony world near Telos, these rare crystals have an almost Kyber-like connection to the Force. When installed in a lightsaber, these crystals bolster one's sensitivity to the Force to an unrivaled degree, turning those with even the most tenuous connection into a capable adept.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Qixoni
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: Found only on an obscure colony world near Telos, these rare crystals have an almost Kyber-like connection to the Force. When installed in a lightsaber, these crystals bolster one's sensitivity to the Force to an unrivaled degree, turning those with even the most tenuous connection into a capable adept.

Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.label: Crystal, Solari
Lightsaber.HiltPartDef.description: There are many famous lightsaber crystals spoken of in the history of the Jedi Order, though few are as powerful as the legendary Solari Crystal.\n\nWhen the great Jedi Master Ood Bnar initiated his life-cycle change after a thousand years of serving the Order, he bequeathed the Solari Crystal to his most promising student, a young female Jedi named Shaela Nuur. When Shaela disappeared shortly after the time of the Great Hunt, the Solari Crystal vanished with her.
